title: Brief notes upon the whole book of Psalms put forth for the help of such who desire to exercise themselves in them and cannot understand without a guide : being a pithie and clear opening of the scope and meaning of the text to the capacitie of the weakest / by George Abbot.
author: Abbot, George, 1604-1649.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by William Bentley and are to be sold by John Williams ... and Francis Eglesfield ...,
